person.name: William R. Walker
person.description: Elder William R. Walker was called as a General Authority of The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints in 2002. He served in the Second Quorum of the Seventy for six years. On April 6, 2008, he was named a member of the First Quorum of the Seventy. He has served as the Executive Director of the Temple Department since 2007. As Executive Director, he works closely with the First Presidency in the oversight and administration of the Church's many temples throughout the world.
